thread.section_title: Le Pradey - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Service
thread.title_full: Best Service - Review of Le Pradey, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Traceytn29
title: Best Service
text:
I recently stayed at Le Pradey. The staff were ALL incredible. David and Manon helped us out with special requests and we enjoyed our stay in Paris so much due to them. I never thought a hotel could make or break a holiday until I stayed here. Highly recommended.
Room Tip: top floor with roof top views was great See more room tips
